name: Super Mario Pentron
description:
Super Pentron Adventure can be download for free games. Start playing now and remember your childhood memories!

  Super Pentron Adventure is a series of platform video games with a journey of super boy and a new kind of super boy - classic platform game. With familiar characters, Super Pentron Adventure is such a childhood game. Take you back to the school days. Super Pentron Adventure is an adventure arcade game (known as "Syobon Action" or "Pentron Mario") , it's about a young man who ventured to adventure after the kopa kidnapped princess. Control Pentron to run, jump and pounce on monsters. Start your adventure, run across 18 worlds as you smash through those tricky monsters. Travel through plains, caverns, ghost houses, spiders, monster tree, dragons and more... Filled with unexpected obstacles, struggle to get to the final destination. Then Pentron can take his princess back.

FEATURES:

- Beautiful classic graphics and smooth animation.

- Classic platform game and easy to control.

- Challenging boss fights. - New puzzle elements, exciting adventure.

- Different monster has different skills,jump to crash them.

- Tons of props, boost your adventure.

- Collect a large amount of gold coins.

- A new kind of Mario game that you can play with one hand in Run mode.

The traps are different from what you would expect from a jump and run game. Skill and a bit of imagination are needed and nerves of steel because it can be frustrating at times (which makes the game so addicting). Are you ready?
